title: Banoffee Pie
directions: Make Dulce de Leche with sweetened condensed milk by removing the paper label and laying the can on it's side in a soup pot. Pour in enough water to cover the can by at least 2 inches. Leave pot UNCOVERED over high heat and allow to come to a simmer. Reduce the heat and simmer for 2 hours for a lighter caramel or up to 3 hours for darker caramel. Check pot every now and then to make sure water is covering and add more if necessary.
GRIND graham crackers, mix with MELTED butter and sugar until combined. Should be thick and coarse. Press mixture into bottom of pie tin and bake crust for 15 minutes. Remove from oven to let cool.
Mix cream, vanilla and powdered sugar in mixer until peaks form.
Spread Dulce de Leche into pie crust. Add SLICED bananas on top of milk. Spread whipped cream on top of banana. Refrigerate uncovered for at least 2 hours, but best if chilled overnight.
